queries.query:
INSERT INTO TB_DEPENDENTE( ID_TITULAR, TP_DEPENDENTE, NM_DEPENDENTE, NR_CPF, DT_NASCIMENTO, NR_MATRICULA,
USER_CREATED, DT_ALTERED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,
?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )

UPDATE TB_DEPENDENTE SET ID_TITULAR = ?, TP_DEPENDENTE = ?, NM_DEPENDENTE = ?, NR_CPF = ?, DT_NASCIMENTO = ?, NR_MATRICULA = ?,
USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
